content.question: Cynthia’s use of “they” to describe both the plant managers (line 13 and line 15) and the plant workers (line 15) suggests that she

choices.label: no longer considers herself part of either group
sees little difference between the two groups
feels superior to the members of both groups
does not know any of the people described personally

content.answer: no longer considers herself part of either group

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
